title: Sisters
name: Junjeong & Nammo
summary: The sisters are composed of The Scholar (the first name) and the Warrior (the second name), who are two souls bound to one body, which both claim to be the rightful owner of. The Scholar often maintains control, but the Warrior is able to seize autonomy of the body, primarily when there is blood to shed. Refer to them not as the combined sisters, but the Scholar or Warrior, depending on who is in control.
history: Orphaned by a powerful warlord, the sisters were trained in tactics and combat. After a victory celebration, the two sisters set out to kill the other and a massacre occurred, leaving one sister dead. Both claim to be the survivor and the other a parasitic spirit. They now seek the power at the Estate to rid themselves of the other.

status.description: In good health and high spirit

clothing.accessories: The spirit of the sister not in control hovers behind the body, their translucent form only rarely seen by the other heroes.

weaknesses: Limited access to inactive sister's skills

magic: Forbidden knowledge allowing manipulation of life essence
notes: The Sister's personality differs greatly depending on who is in control, expressing only the mannerisms of that sister
Both sisters act like the body is theirs, and introduce themselves and refer to it by their own name, acting as if the other sister doesn't exist
The inactive sister spectates as a detached, invisible spirit and has no influence over the word or actions of the body
In combat, the sister in control sometimes reluctantly relinquish it to take advantage of the other's strength
